mapper.select: SELECT U0.ID AS USERID,U0.HEADIMG AS HEADIMG,U0.USERNAME AS USERNAME,G0.*,GETREGIONBYBASEID(g0.region) AS ADDR,getGoodsMainImgPath(G0.ID) AS PATH,getGoodsMessageNum(G0.ID) AS MSGNUM,getclazzsbygoodsid(g0.id) as clazz FROM USERS U0,GOODS G0 WHERE G0.OWNER = U0.ID and g0.id =#{value}
mapper.update: update goods set buyer=#{buyer},buytime=#{buytime},toprovince=#{toprovince},tocity=#{tocity},tocounty=#{tocounty},todetail=#{todetail},phone=#{phone}, torealname=#{torealname},status=#{status} where id=#{id}
